meta.description: An artillery calculator made for Multicrew Tank Combat on Roblox.

typography.blastRange: This projectile has blast range data
typography.heightmap: This map features a heightmap for improved accuracy
typography.instructions: <kbd>LMB</kbd> to set your position. <kbd>RMB</kbd> to set the target's position. Hold <kbd>MMB</kbd> to move the map around, and scroll wheel to zoom.
